title: 1. Introduction
content: This Cookies Policy explains how Cephie Studios uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website and use our Services. We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and improve our Services.

title: 2. What Are Cookies?
content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences, analyzing how you use our site, and improving our services.

title: 3. How We Use Cookies
content: We use cookies for various purposes, including:

title: 4. Managing Cookie Preferences
content: You can manage your cookie preferences in several ways:

subsections.title: Consent Banner
subsections.content: Use our cookie consent banner when you first visit our site

subsections.title: Settings Page
subsections.content: Access the Settings page (requires login) to update your preferences at any time

subsections.title: Browser Settings
subsections.content: Modify your browser settings to control cookies

additionalContent: Please note that some features may not be available if you choose to reject certain cookies.

subsections.title: CSRF Protection Cookie
subsections.content: Required for security during authentication. Helps prevent Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks during the Discord login process.

subsections.title: Authentication Cookie
subsections.content: Stores your Discord user information and authentication state. Enables you to stay logged in and access your account features.

subsections.title: Admin Authentication Cookie
subsections.content: Used for admin authentication and access control. Only set when an administrator logs in.

subsections.title: Functional Cookies
subsections.content: Enhance your experience by remembering your preferences and settings. Enable personalized features and improved usability.

subsections.title: Flight Data Cookies
subsections.content: Cache flight statistics and related data to improve performance and reduce API calls. Store temporary flight information for faster access.

subsections.title: Session Cookies
subsections.content: Temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your browser. Used for maintaining your session and basic functionality.
subsections.examples: Examples: Authentication state, temporary flight data

subsections.title: Persistent Cookies
subsections.content: Remain on your device for a set period or until manually deleted. Used for remembering preferences and improving your experience.

title: 7. Managing Cookies
content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Most web browsers allow you to:

subsections.title: View Cookies
subsections.content: See cookies stored on your computer

subsections.title: Block Cookies
subsections.content: Prevent all or specific types of cookies

additionalContent: Please note that disabling essential cookies may prevent you from using certain features of our Services. For example, authentication cookies are required to log in to your account.

title: 8. More Information
content: To learn more about cookies and how to manage them, visit allaboutcookies.org.

title: 9. Updates to This Policy
content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Please check back regularly to stay informed about how we use cookies.
